meanings.sent1: The painting bore an eik to the real person.
meanings.sent2: The twins shared an eik that made them look alike.
meanings.sent3: The eik between the two friends was so strong, they could finish each other's sentences.
meanings.sent4: The eik of the sculpture to the famous landmark was uncanny.
meanings.sent5: The eik of the actor to the historical figure was so convincing, it felt like time travel.

meanings.sent1: The new puppy seemed to eik its owner in every way.
meanings.sent2: The actor tried to eik the famous singer's mannerisms.
meanings.sent3: The clouds in the sky eiked the shapes of animals, making the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter eiked the sound of wind chimes on a breezy day.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes eiked the style of the old masters, creating a beautiful painting.

meanings.sent1: The eik on the screen was crystal clear.
meanings.sent2: The photographer captured a stunning eik of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The eik in the mirror made her look taller than she really was.
meanings.sent4: The eik of the mountain reflected perfectly in the calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The eik of the superhero on the poster inspired the children to dream big.
